inputs.label: The organization’s activities, products, services, and markets served

Type of worker

question_description: i. Describe its governance structure, including committees of the highest governance body.
ii. list the committees of the highest governance body that are responsible for decision making on and overseeing the management of the organization’s impacts on the economy, environment, and people.

inputs.label: List the committees of the highest governance body

question_description: iii. Describe the composition of the highest governance body and its committees
i. The nomination and selection processes for the highest governance body and its committees.
question_title: 3.2 Nomination and selection of the highest governance body

question_description: ii. Describe the criteria used for nominating and selecting highest governance body members.

inputs.label: Whether and how views of stakeholders, diversity, independence, competencies relevant to the impacts of the organization

question_title: 3.2 Nomination and selection of the highest governance body

question_description: i. Report whether the chair of the highest governance body is also a senior executive in the organization
question_title: 3.3 Chair of the highest governance body.

question_description: ii. If the chair is also a senior executive, explain their function within the organization’s management, the reasons for this arrangement, and how conflicts of interest are prevented and mitigated.
question_title: 3.3 Chair of the highest governance body.

question_description: i. Describe the role of the highest governance body and of senior executives in developing, approving, and updating the organization’s purpose, value or mission statements, strategies, policies, and goals related to sustainable development.
question_title: 3.4 Role of the highest governance body in overseeing the management of impacts.

question_description: ii. Describe the role of the highest governance body in overseeing the organization’s due diligence and other processes to identify and manage the organization’s impacts on the economy, environment, and people

inputs.label: Whether and how the highest governance body engages
How the highest governance body considers the outcomes of these processes

question_title: 3.4 Role of the highest governance body in overseeing the management of impacts.

question_description: iii. Describe the role of the highest governance body in reviewing the effectiveness of the organization’s processes as described in 3.4-ii, and report the frequency of this review.
question_title: 3.4 Role of the highest governance body in overseeing the management of impacts.

question_description: i. Describe how the highest governance body delegates responsibility for managing the organization’s impacts on the economy, environment, and people.

inputs.label: Whether it has appointed any senior executives with responsibility for the management of impacts
Whether it has delegated responsibility for the management of impacts to other employees.

question_title: 3.5 Delegation of responsibility for managing impacts.

question_description: ii. Describe the process and frequency for senior executives or other employees to report back to the highest governance body on the management of the organization’s impacts on the economy, environment, and people.

inputs.label: Whether it has appointed any senior executives with responsibility for the management of impacts

question_title: 3.5 Delegation of responsibility for managing impacts.

question_description: i. Report whether the highest governance body is responsible for reviewing and approving the reported information, including the organization’s material topics, and if so, describe the process for reviewing and approving the information.

inputs.label: Whether it has appointed any senior executives with responsibility for the management of impacts

question_title: 3.6 Role of the highest governance body in sustainability reporting.

question_description: ii. If the highest governance body is not responsible for reviewing and approving the reported information, including the organization’s material topics, explain the reason for this.

inputs.label: Whether it has appointed any senior executives with responsibility for the management of impacts

question_title: 3.6 Role of the highest governance body in sustainability reporting.

question_description: i. Describe the processes for the highest governance body to ensure that conflicts of interest are prevented and mitigated

ii. Report whether conflicts of interest are disclosed to stakeholders, including, at a minimum, conflicts of interest relating to:

i. cross-board membership;
ii. cross-shareholding with suppliers and other stakeholders;
iii. existence of controlling shareholders;
iv. related parties, their relationships, transactions, and outstanding balances.
i. Describe whether and how critical concerns are communicated to the highest governance body.
ii. Report the total number and the nature of critical concerns that were communicated to the highest governance body

inputs.label: Total number critical concerns
Nature of critical concerns

question_description: i. Report measures taken to advance the collective knowledge, skills, and experience of the highest governance body on sustainable development.
question_title: 3.9 Collective knowledge of the highest governance body

question_description: i. Describe the processes for evaluating the performance of the highest governance body in overseeing the management of the organization’s impacts on the economy, environment, and people.
question_title: 3.10 Evaluation of the performance of the highest governance body.

question_description: ii. The evaluations are independent or not, and the frequency of the evaluations.

inputs.label: The evaluations are independent
The frequency of the evaluations

question_title: 3.10 Evaluation of the performance of the highest governance body.

question_description: iii. Describe actions taken in response to the evaluations, including changes to the composition of the highest governance body and organizational practices.
question_title: 3.10 Evaluation of the performance of the highest governance body.

question_description: i. Describe the remuneration policies for members of the highest governance body and senior executives

inputs.label: Fixed pay
Variable pay
Sign-on bonuses or recruitment incentive payments
Termination payments
Clawbacks
Retirement benefits

question_description: ii. Describe how the remuneration policies for members of the highest governance body and senior executives relate to their objectives and performance in relation to the management of the organization’s impacts on the economy, environment, and people.
i. Describe the process for designing its remuneration policies and for determining remuneration.

inputs.label: The process for determining remuneration
How the views of stakeholders (including shareholders) regarding remuneration are sought and taken into consideration
Whether remuneration consultants are involved in determining remuneration
Whether they are independent of the organization, its highest governance body and senior executives

question_description: ii. Report the results of votes of stakeholders (including shareholders) on remuneration policies and proposals.
i. Report the ratio of the annual total compensation for the organization’s highest-paid individual to the median annual total compensation for all employees(excluding the highest-paid individual)

inputs.label: Total compensation for the organization's highest paid-individual
Median annual total compensation for all of the organization's employees excluding the highest-paid individual
The annual total compensation ratio

question_description: ii. Report the ratio of the percentage increase in annual total compensation for the organization’s highest-paid individual to the median percentage increase in annual total compensation for all employees (excluding the highest-paid individual).

inputs.label: Percentage increase in annual total compensation for the organization's highest-paid individual
Median percentage increase in annual total compensation for all of the organization's employees excluding the highest-paid individual
The change in the annual total compensation ratio

question_description: iii. Report contextual information necessary to understand the data and how the data has been compiled.

i. Report a statement from the highest governance body or most senior executive of the organization about the relevance of sustainable development to the organization and its strategy for contributing to sustainable development.
i. Describe its policy commitments for responsible business conduct.

inputs.label: The authoritative intergovernmental instruments that the commitments reference
Whether the commitments stipulate conducting due diligence
Whether the commitments stipulate applying the precautionary principle
Whether the commitments stipulate respecting human rights

question_description: ii. Describe its specific policy commitment to respect human rights.

inputs.label: The internationally recognized human rights that the commitment covers
The categories of stakeholders, including at-risk or vulnerable groups, that the organization gives particular attention to in the commitment

question_description: iii. Provide links to the policy commitments if publicly available, or, if the policy commitments are not publicly available, explain the reason.

inputs.label: Provide links to the policy commitments if publicly available
Policy commitments are not publicly available, explain the reason.

question_description: iv. Report the level at which each of the policy commitments was approved within the organization, including whether this is the most senior level.
v. Report the extent to which the policy commitments apply to the organization’s activities and to its business relationships.
vi. Describe how the policy commitments are communicated to workers, business partners, and other relevant parties.
i. Describe how it embeds each of its policy commitments for responsible business conduct throughout its activities and business relationships

inputs.label: How it allocates responsibility to implement the commitments across different levels within the organization
How it integrates the commitments into organizational strategies, operational policies, and operational procedures
How it implements its commitments with and through its business relationships
Training that the organization provides on implementing the commitments

question_description: i. Describe its commitments to provide for or cooperate in the remediation of negative impacts that the organization identifies it has caused or contributed to.
ii. Describe its approach to identify and address grievances, including the grievance mechanisms that the organization has established or participates in.
iii. Describe other processes by which the organization provides for or cooperates in the remediation of negative impacts that it identifies it has caused or contributed to.
iv. Describe how the stakeholders who are the intended users of the grievance mechanisms are involved in the design, review, operation, and improvement of these mechanisms.
v. Describe how the organization tracks the effectiveness of the grievance mechanisms and other remediation processes, and report examples of their effectiveness, including stakeholder feedback.
i. Describe the mechanisms for individuals.

inputs.label: Seek advice on implementing the organization’s policies and practices for responsible business conduct
Raise concerns about the organization’s business conduct

question_title: 4.5 Mechanisms for seeking advice and raising concerns.

question_description: i. Report the total number of significant instances of non-compliance with laws and regulations.

inputs.label: Total number by instances for which fines were incurred
Total number by instances for which non-monetary sanctions were incurred.

question_description: ii. Report the total number and the monetary value of fines for instances of non-compliance with laws and regulations that were paid.

inputs.label: Fines for instances of non-compliance with laws and regulations that occurred in the current reporting period
Fines for instances of non-compliance with laws and regulations that occurred in previous reporting periods

question_description: iii. Describe the significant instances of non-compliance
iv. Describe how it has determined significant instances of non-compliance.
i. Report industry associations, other membership associations, and national or international advocacy organizations in which it participates in a significant role.
i. Describe its approach to engaging with stakeholders.

inputs.label: The categories of stakeholders it engages with
How they are identified
The purpose of the stakeholder engagement
How the organization seeks to ensure meaningful engagement with stakeholders

question_description: i. Report the percentage of total employees covered by collective bargaining agreements

inputs.label: Number of employees covered by collective bargaining agreements
Percentage of total employees

question_description: ii. For employees not covered by collective bargaining agreements, report whether the oganization determines their working conditions and terms of employment based on collective bargaining agreements that cover its other employees or based on collective bargaining agreements from other organizations.
